Blackrazor slowly climbed to his feet, his =

t." he said quietly
as he glanced around and then shimmered and vanished fr=
om sight.

Meanwhile Phobia continued to target Rat Trap, she stopped using=

he=
eled shoes. He sent her long dagger like heels at the Rat as he

Legacy=

wn the shield, the one that had Quickstride seperated

ully without damaging Quickstride.

d to back away from

ay, and yet

e
